about_the_game:
Game features:
1, each appearance of the good man has a unique skills and equipment can be used.
2, the appearance of the good man can only be equipped with a type of weapon. Part of the weapons can not be bought in the store, you need to go to various places to explore to get, the characteristics of different weapons and hidden attributes of different bonuses.
3, the game set up a rich skill system, in addition to some of the exclusive skills, the player in the travel of a variety of coincidence will be part of the scroll, so as to learn additional skills.
4, the game set up a wealth of combat status, divided into favorable and unfavorable state, by throwing objects or using skills can make their own or the enemy. By throwing items or using skills, you can make your own or the enemy's generals have the probability of obtaining a variety of statuses, thus reversing the situation on the battlefield.
5. The game has set up a wealth of items that can be explored, which have different effects. The acquisition of items in addition to the traditional free to pick up or fight to get, after getting special items in the big map walking will also have unexpected surprises.

Players don't need to collect all the Water Margin heroes to challenge the final Demon King, but at the same time, those who lose a battle while exploring the map will be permanently separated from the team. Therefore, it is necessary to plan the route and train the heroes well, which enhances the fun of the game!

short_description: This is a single-player game that combines interesting elements of role-playing and strategy open-world games. Players will take on the role of Shi Jin, to save the world of Water Margin.
